      • calculate_extra_points

        public static int calculate_extra_points(int round_points)
        Calculates extra points for a turn. If the score is even it will add 10 points If the score is odd then 5 points are subtracted
        Parameters:
        round_points - numbers on the die
        Returns:
        Integer extra points awarded in this round

      • new_total

        public static int new_total(int round_score,
                            int previous_total)
        Adds the round score to the total. If the score becomes lower than 0, the score is set to 0
        Parameters:
        round_score - points scored in this round
        previous_total - current total score of the player
        Returns:
        Integer the user's new running total

      • orderByScore

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String[]> orderByScore(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String[]> users)
        Loops through the user database and re-orders them using the bubble sort algorithm based on their highest score.
        Parameters:
        users - all users stored in the database
        Returns:
        HashMap database sorted by score

      • update_high_score

        public static void update_high_score(java.lang.String username,
                                     int new_score)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Loops through all users in the database, searching for a user with the specified username. If found, their previous high score is compared to their new score. If the new high score is higher, then it is updated in the database.
        Parameters:
        username - username of the player
        new_score - the latest score of the player
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - database file could not be updated
